txt.en: 'Ha, ha, Sharkey was right! It's easy living up in the North with these little hobbits and fat townsmen ripe for the plucking!'
'We'll be moving into the Shire soon. This is going to be fun!'
'That fat little Farmer Maggot was a real pushover. We'll have to get our food from his place all the time.'
'You traitor! We'll gut you for this! Sharkey's Men will have their revenge!'
